subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
Colleges and Universities
Ethics (Personal)
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Marks, a professor at Penn State, introduced the Jerry Sandusky scandal in his ethics course to a wide range of responses from students, all of them impassioned.
snippet: Jonathan Marks, a professor at Penn State, introduced the Jerry Sandusky scandal in his ethics course to a wide range of responses from students, all of them impassioned.
